reviews.review:
I don't really need to say much, since everyone's thinking the same thing, but maybe I can offer an outside perspective. I never really dealt with games until the day the Playstation 2 port of this game finally arrived in the mail a few years ago. This is the first fps I had ever played, and the first one I was ever infatuated with. I'll tell you what, if the hours spent on the PS2 port could be transferred to my Steam Profile, the hours would be in the hundreds.


I owe a lot to this game and its creators. It opened up a whole new world of wonder for me.

I used to not like this game when I first played it but after giving it a second chance I've grown to love the game and it's combat. The game still has some of the best level design even when compared to modern FPS games. All of the weapons are useful and feel satisfying to wield against the different enemy types. Sometimes the player is forced to take damage which can be annoying but this is rare in the campaign and overall the game is pretty fair and balanced.
ADAM YA ADAM YA GELDİ ADAM
Как была лучшей игрой так и осталась. 10 Избитых учёных  из 10!

Legendary game from 1998 with gameplay that holds up to this day. 

BUY IT ALREADY

Это была дебютная игра в Valve. Игра, потрясшая всю без остатка игровую индустрию прорывной, невероятно реалистичной по тем временам графикой, добротной физикой, гениальным сюжетом, она привнесла новую, еще нигде ранее не использовавшуюся механику искусственного интеллекта, с которым можно было скооперироваться и использовать в качестве союзника. Кроме того, игра обросла дополнениями (Blue Shift, Opposing Force), модами (Ricochet, Team Fortress, They Hunger, Counter-Strike, Deathmatch classic и многие другие), а так же породила множество мемов о монтировке и ее обладателе. Спасибо, 10 монтировок из 10!
Mimo tom że mamy już 2021 rok moim zdaniem gra ciągle jest warta zakupu 10/10 Polecam ją kupić w jakimś zestawie na Steam

The Citizen Kane of video games, and it still holds up to this day. Everyone needs to experience Half Life at least once, the game is a testament to the incredible drama and player choice that made Valve one of the most respected video game companies in the world. To this day this silly little game is completely annihilating all the triple A moderns that have mastered the so called formula. Nothing EVER did single player narrative better than Half Life, which is why its such a titan of the industry. It's the game that started it all, and for that alone, it deserves to be worshiped. Conveniently enough, the game is far more than its legacy. Even today people are experiencing Half Life's amazing story (HLVR:AI) The game will never not be important, respected, remembered, revered, cherished, and most importantly, good.
Jogo clássico e antigo que continua bom
The best game ever! I am playing it for over 20 years and still enjoying.

100/10 game

Played it for the first time ever in 2021 and I'm quite impressed considering it came out in 1998. Very nostalgic too because I played a lot of CS 1.6 in my childhood and this game is the reason why CS even exists. The only let downs were the final levels and the endings were kind of meh.

Things i liked:
-the puzzles
-the combat
-the atmosphere
-the story

Things i Didn't like:
-the entirety of Xen
-the length of certain parts (interloper and on a rail)
-the platforming

I would give this game 8.5/10. This is a must play game for anyone who has a PC. It hasn't aged the best in certain parts, especially the last half. Xen felt very rushed. However, I without a doubt don't regret playing this game to the end. Please play this game if you haven't.
It was really something else, not like your ordinary game. Great game, it was ahead of it's time.

A timeless classic. Quintessential part of any PC gamer's collection.
Yes, play this before even considering touching the "Black Mesa" fan-remake.
I did not know that Walter White worked at black mesa.

"Run, Think, Shoot, Live" - Half-life's tagline. Half-life is wonderful (and i do know you have seen it before). Every moment is pure adrenaline, planning, and chaos. Half-life is one of the best games you can get. The story-line is short (around 10 hrs) , but the amount of amazing characters and fun they fit into that time is amazing. With lots of different routes and secrets there is [/b] a lot [b] of replayability. Plus, it is cheap for all the content you get.
TL;DR
PLAY IT NOW IT GOOD

A fantastic blend of stealth and horror combined with strategic gameplay that keeps you on your toes. I highly recommend anyone who enjoys FPS games to try this game out!

Have not played the original Half-Life since it was new many years ago. Even though the engine and design are from years ago, it still has great gameplay and problem solving. It is interesting playing it after such a long break, learning all over again. Lets you appreciate how gaming has evolved.
